content.detailedDescription:
I was placing the sprinkler on my lawn and as i set it and looked up, i saw a bright like appear over the horizon.  the object appeared at the horizon facing due north from state highway 240 about 1 mile north of downtown burkburnett.  as the object appeared it was a very bright white light but very small and consise.  it seemed to move straight up and slowed as it climbed to what appeared to be an altitude of about 1 mile.  as the object slowed to nearly a stop, the intensity seemed to die off.  my immediate thought was some sort of fireworks.  however it had no type of contrail. (smoke, sparks, fire)  then it increased in intensity and rapidly accelerated in a wnw direction of mostly the same altitude.  it took almost no time (1 second?) to be completely out of sight.

i am a paranormal investigator, (although mostly in other realms) not that it makes me any more credible, but i hear reports all the time.  right now i am completely dumbfounded and i really don't know what to think.  honestly as i watched, i got chill bumps and really just stood there with my mouth open.  i'm really not sure what it was.

i love star gazing, and about four or five days ago, i saw a shooting star.  minutes later out of the corner of my eye, i saw another light that was different in intensity and direction.  it just looked weird.  but i blew it off as another shooting star.  this episode started in the same area of the sky.
content.summary: Straight up from horizon, then a hard left and radid acceleration.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along highway 213 heading south and looking east i observed 1 flash over the setting moon, low on the horizon.  a few minutes later, i observed another distinct flash over the setting moon, almost in the same area.  flashes were not bright, but diffuse as if very far away.

the light emitted seemed to be white.

my first thought was satellites turning and catching some of the early rays of the rising sun, but the flashes were faint, medium in size and diffused.  my second thought was military craft or maneuvers, or the flash of some space junk or rock entering earths atmosphere.  however, i thought it was odd that there were two flashes in the same exact area, and right in front of the moon.

i did not stop, but continued to observe the area, but did not see any other flashes.

at the time, there were no airplane lights present anywhere to the east that i could observe, either before or 10-15 minutes afterward.

i have never seen anything quite like that before and thought it was odd.  i do spend a considerable amount of time stargazing and am familiar with many of the things that appear in the night sky.  this was new.
content.summary: Two distinct flashes directly in front of moon.

content.detailedDescription:
Aug 7,  2010     aproximately 8:30 pm
my wife and i were in the park on the north side.   she could not see the object with her naked eyes and never saw it.   i described what i was seeing to her.
evening daylight,    almost due east,   a huge towering cloud with an anvil top that was discharging lighning.    the cloud was glowing brightly at the top because of the setting sun.
it was about 10 miles  or more from us.    i was looking at it with my highpower binculars and
noticed a shinney black dot or oval shape appear right next to the cloud.   it was located just above the middle of the towering storm cloud.   it stayed it that position for maybe one minute   then went into the cloud.   it was in the cloud maybe thirty or forty seconds,  then came out at the same position along side of the cloud.    it stayed there for for over a minute,  then moved off around the noth end of the cloud,  turning to the north east and leasurly went that direction untill is was out of sight.

aug 8, 2010    about 9:00
we were at our favorite spot again in the park.    i was getting dark and a extremely intense light started approaching us from the south west,    it looked to be maybe a half mile away when it stoped and just stayed in the same position for what seemed like three minutes.   then it went out.  it looked like it was only a hundred feet from the ground.    we saw what looked like light aircraft pass by with their marker lights on just shortly aftward.  they were slightly to the south of where the object was only at a higher altitude.   

side note  there was a notam posted the the dallas, collin and some srounding  areas were in a no fly zone for a period of time today   aug 9, 2010.   the reason  i received this notam is because i fly rc aircraft.
content.summary: Black sphere going in and out of thunder head cloud.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8:30 pm sunday, august, 8, 2010. i was sitting on my front porch, which faces west, having a cigarette and looking at the sky as i often do around sunset. something caught my eye directly overhead, it was a large shiny cigar or cylinder shaped object and appeared to be going very fast traveling east to west. at first i thought it was just an airplane, but i quickly realised that i could not see any wings or hear any sound from it (and auburn, ks is a small quiet comunity), so i thought it must be at a very high altitude, but it did not leave the usual con-trail that 767's and such leave at high altitude and looked to be twice the length, on top of that 767's that high up appear much slower and can usualy still be heard. the object continued west until i could not see it over the trees lasting about 1 min or less. now here's the thing, most of us out here can tell 767 from a kc-135. the 190th air refuling wing (the kansas coyotes) opperates out of forbes feild about 7 miles north of here so air trafic is very common over here, mostly kc-135s and other military craft, i have seen or studied most all known aircraft and this had none of the usual characteristics, i don't claim to know what it was but i know what it was not, it was not a conventional airplane. if any one else in the area has seen this or photographed it i would like to hear about it.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object passed over-head very fast and silent.

content.detailedDescription:
Swimming event

photo taken by an associated press and was listed on aol news this morning.  it has since been removed from aol, but it is still available at the associated press website, under the swimming event, on page 9 of 11.  this is an ap photo from aol.

*(info and name deleted -- sgonzalez/cms).

members of the team of italy dive to start their performance during the synchronized swimming team free routine final at the european swimming championships in budapest, hungary, saturday, aug. 7, 2010. italy placed fourth.
content.summary: Ap photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Since december 25 2009, i have been taking photographs of the night sky,
that was the first time i photographed these objects, i was right outside behind my house. usually i take thses photos after dark. they appear to move very quickly sometimes, and other times they appear to hover. when taking
off from a hover position, they appear like a shooting star, with a trail of flame behind them. some nights you can't see them with the naked eye,
but upon taking pics with a flash they appear anywhere's from 1 to many
round spherical objects, other times you can see what appears to be different abject shaped objects lit any of many colors ranging from red,green, orange, yellow, blue, white. any given night i can go outside and point my camera up to the sky and there is generally anywhere's from 1 to many. when i first saw these i was frightened, other times i thought i may have possibly seen things that may be secret machinery unknown to the general public. they make absolutely no sounds most of the time, and other times you can hear what sounds like a bunch of jets hovering a long ways up. most objects appear to be anywheres from 200 to several thousand feet up. some even as high as the stars. and they're not satellites, you can tell the difference, satellites move usually in one direction across the sky. one night i watched as one of these objects chased a jet. they
block out the stars when they are overhead and sometimes move very quickly.
a couple of times i've seen what appeared to be a star, and then it got brighter and brighter and actually lit me up.When i looked up it dimmed slowly and flew slowly away towards the north/northeast. in many of the photos that i have when you zoom them in, you can see beings inside, they look like people but some are green and other colors. this may be due to the colors inside the object.
content.summary: Have many photos of various colored and shaped objects.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were playing outside in the garden. a passenger aircraft was flying over to the north of us and i looked up at it. i then notice four greyish black disc like shapes moving near the aircraft but moving south of it. they were almost directly overhead us at the nearest point. the four objects were moving at the same speed and appeared to be rotating and moving. i told my daughter to quickly run inside and get the camera as i felt they were something unusual. they were quite far by the time i took the photos and i had to fully zoom in. the sky was overcast and cloudy which made them more visible.
content.summary: Sighting of 4 disc like grey/black objects moving silently across a cloudy sky which appeared to be rotating and moving.

content.detailedDescription:
7/7/10 9:53 pm est.

i was at small gathering of friends on top of a place we call boenhill, in northfield, vermont. we were sitting around a bon fire when someone noticed this object coming from south to north. i was in the treeline when it was first noticed and i ran out to the field near the bon fire to take a look.

there was 9 of us there that night and we all saw this object.

it flew from south to north and covered the entire skyline in 45 -60 seconds.
the object did not make any sound. planes fly over bonehill all the time but we can hear them. this did not make a peep. 

the object was very bright and appeared fairly large in the sky. it was moving very fast and i have never seen anything move that fast.

the object flew right over us but it was appeared to be very high in the sky.
being at night i really have no clue how far up it was but it seemed very high as we could not hear anything.

it was a incredibly clear night sky and all of the stars were visible.

there were some shooting stars that night but this was no shooting star.

because it was such a clear night we were able to see satellites in the sky.

the object we saw was at least 1o times larger and brighter then any satellite i have ever seen.

after it flew over us it continued north and we were watching its backside. it had blinking lights on it(i think 2 blinking lights). after it went out of sight i went back into the treeline where we were playing cards.

about a minute later some of my friends saw it again and it was traveling from west to east. this time when i ran out i did not get to see it as it was over the hill already. but my friends claims it looked like what we had seen just earlier.

i am not sure what it was to be honest. i know alot about ufo's and military aircraft. in my life i have never seen a ufo. every time i have looked up in the sky at some weird object i have been able to identify it.

this was some sort of aircraft for sure but it was no commercial airliner or anything like that. i also work next to an air national guard base in burlington, vermont. i see military aircraft take off and land all of the time. this object appeared to fly much higher and made no sound. f-16s and f-15 make a ton of sound.

imo this had to either be a new military spy plane or something even more bizarre.

as it flew over head my friends scrambled for their cell phones to take photos and/or video. i have not seen any of this yet but i am hoping there is something captured.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright, high flying object traveling at very fast speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
Date: july 31, 2010
location: connecticut coastline overlooking long island sound.
time: approximately 9:45 pm
i was standing outside looking at the water and the sky, and noticed a large round red/orange object in the sky moving from the east and traveling west. it appeared to have tear drop or flower petal shapes which pointed toward the center. it maintained the same speed until close to directly overhead, and then increased speed rapidly while moving to the west and climbing. as it seemed to gain altitude the size became smaller until it was out of sight.
i went in to the house and got my digital camera and brought two other people out with me.
about three to five minutes later the three of us witnessed the same thing. in all, there were four sightings almost exactly as described above. i was able to get a few pictures. only one came out well enough to see a discernable shape. the others were blurred due to my not holding the camera steady enough. 
the digital photo did not show the petal shapes, however it does show something like a red/orange fireball.
content.summary: Four round red-orange objects 5 minutes apart.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my back porch  watching a very bright light at dusk & realizing it was not a star . it would drop in the sky about 2 feet until it was behind trees ! came insisde & told my husband & then he went to the front yard & called me out there was 7 " unidentified flying objects " that circled above our house for 2-3 hrs . i have watched many planes , helicopters & jets fly over my home in the 23 yrs i have lived here and these were not any of the above !! very quiet and would just circle , following one another tried to get pictures but all ya really see is a light in the sky !! this is not an airplane , jet or helicopter , this has been going on approx . since the end of june & almost every night between 9 pm & 11 pm !! i was very shocked , and had to call my children to have them see these objects !!
content.summary: Objects flying around area for approx . 2-3 hrs bright light then will move & see flashing & very slow moving.

content.detailedDescription: Here are the original photographs of the three ufo sightings i recently submitted. they are in photoshop (.Psd) file format. once in photoshop, open the "layers" window (f7) and click on the eye to expose/hide guides and layers. i also highly suggest zooming way in on the objects, and adjusting such settings as: brightness/contrast, levels, and curves, to get an idea of the objects' shape, size and possible distance from viewer. after i zoomed in very close, i noticed that in each of the photographs, the objects have similar characteristics, such as size and shape. this is especially obvious and apparent since the objects take up only a few pixels. the best example of this is noticed in ���duel lightning strike���, which is the photograph that has two simultaneous lightning strikes, specifically, the object in the vicinity of the lightning strike on the left hand side of the screen. when viewed at an extreme zoom, there is a distinct, almost diamond shape to the pixels, especially during/after adjusting the various brightness and contrast levels. it is curious that the most distinctive feature that all the objects in each photo share, is the very blackness of what i will refer to as ���the core��� of the objects. the objects closest to the lightning strikes reveal an outline to this core. this could be attributed to many things; my guess is light diffraction. in the next lightning photo (���single strike���) the viewer may note that there is also an object in close proximity (at least from the viewer���s angle) to the lightning strike, and it too seems to have what appears to be an outline of the center of the object. the photo, or should i says photos, that convinced me that these objects were more than ���specks of dust on the lens��� or ���birds/insects���, is the 3 frame sequence. when i overlapped the three frames and marked the positions of the objects in each frame, i noticed one thing right away: some objects are in the same position in two of the three frames (these objects appear to be stationary for at least two frames). and i mean absolutely the same position ��� what i might speculate to be a generator/drive with perfect anti-grav/hover capabilities.
content.summary: Original photos of event

content.detailedDescription:
me and my 3 friends (1 was a brother) were all laying on my friends trampoline watching stars in his backyard. we had seen 2 very bright stars and my brother pointed at 1 and said it was an asteriod but we soon noticed that it didnt have a tail or burned out. we watched it move from the spot it started to out to the other side of the sky and when it got there it hovered and dropped then took off again out of site. 
    it wasnt an aircraft because it was slower, made no noise, had no flashing lights or colorful besides its starry white/bright look,and moved in such a way that an aircraft couldnt. it had no tail and stayed in the air for a few minutes. it looked as low as about an airplane and made no noise.
    we all felt scared and confused. we had no idea what it was and had been joking about ufo's before and seeing a real 1 made us want to know what it was.
    we lost site of the object when it flew over the trees in the horizon.
content.summary: Looked like a bright star and moved around unearthly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures at white sands new mexico and noticed objects that i could not explain or identify. the objects have the same atributes in each photo. although they are almost pixel sized, i did notice very distinct and similar features of the objects in each of the different photographs.
please check out provided original photos in an image viwer: zoom in on the objects and change contrast/levels.
content.summary: Noticed unidentifiable objects after reviewing photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures (at dusk) of the landscape in white sands new mexico. 
at the time of the photos i did not notice anything out of the ordinary, but when i got home and reviewed the images i noticed objects that were unidentifiable. 

i took three photos of the same scene, my camera (a nikon d70) was on a tripod and very stationary. 

i have marked the areas where the objects are/were for each of the three frames.

the green circles are where the objects are in the first frame, the blue circles are where the objects are in the second fram, and the orange circles are where the objects are in the third frame. 

the photos/frames were taken within one minute of each other.
content.summary: Anomolous objects found after reviewing photos

content.detailedDescription: I was out at white sands national monument taking photographs of lightning and the landscape. at the time i noticed nothing unusual, but when i was reviewing the images on my pc, i noticed some anomolous objects in the images.
content.summary: I was photographing lightning and landscape and when i got home i noticed odd shapes in the photos.

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my bed room about 4 :13 am and wanted a smoke , i usually like to stargaze to see if i can see anything unusual , and tonight i sis it was a glowing bright diamond in the sky traveling from southwest to northeast , i know airplanes don't travel that route  , i have no clue to what the object was way to bright to be an airplane and had no blinking lights, i was kinda mad at myself that i did not have a camera or any type of recording device as video would have been the most sufficient, it stayed in the night sky for about a minute til i lost sight over a tree line , i suppose it was about 20,000 feet and traveling  around 1,000mph or more
content.summary: Went out for a smoke.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my truck around 10 pm next to a 40 foot long aluminum storage container on my 3 acre property i had just sold. i was thinking about how i would have liked to have kept my lot but was buying out a partner on another house. i saw a flash of bright light and thought it was a plane crashing into the mountaintop where i was. i realized it was a series of glowing cylinders that was covered in a mist individually. the total area was twice the size of a house. the sound it made was a roar like niagara falls almost deafening even inside my truck. 
their was another craft that was entering the 'doorway' it was gold/brown/yellowish and reminded me of a broken mirror. the craft was shaped like a rugby football. i only saw the front half of the 2nd craft i believe from the reflective light of the first craft. the 2nd craft appeared to be floating and as it entered the doorway they both disappeared. the craft was directly in front of a former astronaut's house which i thought was an incredible coincedence. i asked him about it later and he said he did not know what i was talking about but showed no surprize, amazement, or suspicion which i thought was a very odd reaction to the wildest story he ever heard.
i had been selling the lot and their were two dogs that barked at me constantly. but they were not barking then and i got out of my truck because i expected people to come outside to see what the commotion had been about but no one came outside and i am absolutly sure people would of came outside to see what the roar was about. there were about about 10 homes in visual sight. i think the dogs and people were put to sleep and the aluminim storage container made a barrier to keep me conscious.
i have seen 3 other craft in the area. 2 sightings were a green glowing ball of light floating at sunset along the mountain tops. 1 was a flash of light in a  figure 8 shape 10 pm when i was playing basketball in the dark.
that only lasted 1 second but enough to see it slide as it tuned like it was on wet plastic.
i have heard other stories of sightings in the area and believe it is a portal doorway to another place.  a pilot told me of some very unusual experiences he had but do not want "you know who" to question me because i believe they are very aware of this area. i did see an description on a discovery in the egyptian pyrmids that remined me of this doorway and she described it as a symbol for a doorway into another dimension. but i could not find her website later.
content.summary: Green glowing cylinders 50 feet long covered in mist in a circular pattern with ufo passing thru it.

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching the sky as relaxation. we noticed a triangular star-like object that would blink out after a few minutes and then move about 10 to 15 degrees to the east and then blink back on. we observed this for a period of about 45 minutes. each time the object would blink out and come back extremely bright. looking through the binoculars, the object had colors within it and smaller star like white objects 3 to the left and one to the right of it. the colors were as follows top was blue-green, middle was bright white, lower left was red, lower right was green. it appeared to move drastically and erractically to the south each time. attached is a zoomed pic of what we saw.
there was slight cloud cover, but it was not around the area where we saw the object. we have seen this object for several nights but had not noticed it moving the way it did this evening. rather odd. may just be an anomaly, but thought we should report it anyway.
content.summary: It looked like a star but was much different and moved erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
When i went to bed my wife was already sleeping. as i laid there trying to fall asleep, i started hearing child like foot steps with shoes on. at the time my 2 year old daughter was in her crib sleeping which was located in the rear end of the apartment and our bedroom was located in the front. i had my back toward the back of the the apartment. as i continued to hear these steps walking back and forth i was thinking that it could not be the baby because she could not clime out of the crib, much less put her shoes on and walk around the apartment.
by now i was starting to worry because i couldn't  figure out what the hell was going  on, all i know is that i could hear the steps walk up behind me then turn around and walk away again. on about the third time i heard the steps come up to me and spotted. within a few seconds i heard the voice of a young female tell me in spanish, "roberto don't be afraid we are good spirits." at that point i panicked and tried to turn around to see what was going on but some kind of force was preventing me from turning around. i was scared but i was determined to see what was behind me.
as i continued to struggled with all my strength i was able to look behind me and i saw what appeared to be two translucent spheres purplish in color havering over me. now my fear turned to terror and i tried to turn around so i could reach out to my wife but again i was struggling with this invisible force.
after what it seemed to be about 10 to 15 minutes, i was able to wake up my wife who got scared after i explained what had taken place. i then grabbed my kid and my wife and ran upstairs where my mom lived.
although they identified themselves as spirits, i believe that i was visited by aliens because when  the voice spoke it was in spanish, and my primary language is english. i also remember that i went to bed 1am, and when we went to my moms it was 3am. and i strongly believe that something has watched over me for most of my life.
i even have a foreign object in my had which is suppose to be the tip of a pencil and from what i've heard my body should have rejected the object.
content.summary: I was visited while i was trying to fall asleep.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car on the south side of omaha and i saw a star like light flying around the clouds. it was very far away and it was between me and the clouds. it did not blink at all or change color. it was a solid yellowish white light. i had my camcorder with me and was trying to film it but by the time i got it out it flew into the clouds and i didn't see it. it would have taken me some time anyways to manually adjust my camcorder zoom just to get it focused at that distance. i did not see it again after it flew into the clouds.
content.summary: Star like bright light was seen flying along the clouds during sunset. no blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was turning from wahconah street onto north street, when i saw something bright coming out of the south. it looked like it might have been coming from the direction of the pittsfield airport. i quickly pulled over to watch it. i couldn't make out much of the shape, but it looked round and possibly red. below it were billowing flames. as i watched it move (very quickly) over head directly north, the flames began to die down until they were just barely flickering, then dissipated completely.
content.summary: Round, possibly red with bright flames underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had traveled to westerville ohio to visit a friend who was having a house warming party. we left around 2:30 to travel home in the southern part of the state. traveling down interstate 71 somewhere between morse rd and hudson st i noticed a line of lights off to my right and out the front window of our truck. my first thought was that it was a plane that might be coming in for a landing... but that didnt seem right after a second or two and i asked my wife who was sitting beside me if she could see what i saw. she did see it and was soon as amazed as i was if not more so as i had to go back and fourth from observing and driving. the object changed from a line of lights to a pattern of 3 lights in the shape of a triangle as it got larger and closer to us. soon i was unable to see the object, but my wife was still able to observe out her window. by this time we was both at a loss to explain what we seen.  she put the window down and kept her eyes on it as i asked her what it was doing and what she thought it was as it got closer. she kept saying "i dont know its weird". i was thinking any moment that it would pass over us and i would be able to view it out my side window, but this did not occur. she soon had her head out the window and was gazing directly above us, and at this time she said "i can see its outline againt the sky and its deffinetly a triangle with a light at each corner" (it occurred to me at this point that we both had our digital cameras in the back seat from a wedding shoot we had done and i quickly told her to get a picture of it!  she pulled herself back into the cab grabbed the camera(nikon d5000) and stuck her head and right arm with camera back out the window again. she kept saying it wont focus and the camera says subject is to dark as i franticly asked about the camera and why she couldnt get it to work. at this time the object changed direction  and went returned the direction from which it came! i was asking her whats it doing now when she told me i looks like something just came out of it! she described this to me later as if it had dropped a very faint light the brightness of which was no more than the faintest star out that night but which traveled directly from below the object but lost sight of it before it would of been at ground level. by this point we was going through the many underpasses of 71 and downtown columbus and was unable to view the object any longer. 
 the rest of the 2 hour trip home we talked about what we had just seen and the things that we wished we could of done diffrently, i for one wished i would of pulled over but thinking back i had thought about this but up till the time it was directly over us i thought it would continue its course to the south east and i would see it again and there would be better view of it. i have thought abut this alot today and the cant get it out of my mind and thats one reason i am reporting it here. 
   also to give a little info about myself. i am former military and have been around many aircraft and military bases..  and this wasnt anything i have seen before..Choppers..Jets..Or flairs..!  also there was no noise heard by either of us!  also i asked her how big it was when it was directly over us and asked her to draw its size as it appeared to her. she said it was the size of the 8x10 piece of paper held at arms length! ...I know this doesnt show the height of the object or the size but it does show the clarity of the sighting and the visibility of the triangular outline. she also stated to me after asking that if she had to say what it was made from it would be a dark dull metallic and definetly solid!
content.summary: Silent triangle that flew directly over our truck then flew back the direction it came.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had a few sightings with witnesses.  

the first was in 1994/95 late night driving down a fairly busy city street in lansing, michigan. i noticed a bright light which seemed to be dropping from the sky at a high rate of speed.  we sped up to try and catch up with the object.  i told the driver that i believed it had stopped over an empty parking.  the parking lot was lit up just enough that when trying to see anything above the lights was difficult because it was pitch black out.  by the time we turned the car around and went back to check the parking lot, it had already flown away.  i had rolled my window down earlier to listen for helicoptor noises, but it did not make any noise at all.  i recall seeing a beam of light coming down from the darkness onto the parking lot as if it were dropping someone off or picking someone up. i had called the airport on this sighting to see if there were any helicopers in the area, they said no.  this sighting didn't make me frightened, just left me feeling a little confused.  it happened to be a clear night with a lot of stars out, which made it difficult to differentiate from the stars and a potential source of what i had saw after it flew away.

sighting #2 occured in charlotte, michigan.  it was halloween night about 1998 and everyone was out trick-or-treating, when i looked up and saw a bright irridescent light gliding above the tree line.  i thought that perhaps it was an airplane, but the object was solid, irridescent light, round in shape and didn't make a sound.  it floated peacefully at a constant rate of speed.  the mom that i was with saw this as well, as did her husband who was home on his porch a few blocks away.  there was no sound.  i didn't feel fearful at all from this sighting.  

sighting #3 occured in eaton rapids, michigan in 2002.  i was living in the country with my husband and daughter, when we noticed an auburn colored light hovering over a field near our home.  we saw smaller lights that seemed to eject from the larger object.  after an hour or more of watching the object, it eventually began to move across the sky and out of sight.  i felt fearful with this sighting.  i am not sure why perhaps because of the auburn coloration of the object it seemed less friendly than the irridescent objects seen in previous sightings.  when we tried to videotape the sighting the video camera broke.

i have seen other unexplanable things, which has left me scratching my head, but without any other witnesses besides myself, i'll leave those unreported.
content.summary: Lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday 7/31/10 @ aprox 1 to 2:30 pm my family and i were driving back home through are neighborhood as i saw a small shiny metallic triangular object high in the sky on the westside of madera.At first i thought it was a airplane or jet but it made no noise and was way to high for any ordinary aircraft.As i became excited the rest of my family wanted to see so we drove in reverse and stopped in the middle of the road to watch tis thing and try to make sense of what this was that we were all witnessing.It sort of hovered for a few seconds so high in the clear sky only a few clouds around it.We watched it slowly go slightly left then right it quickly dissapeared in to the air then reapered then dissapered agin this time it was he last time we saw it. it just quickly vanished into the blue sky like it was never there, no evidence whatsoever.Me and family didnt know what we had just seen only that we might have just seen a ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: As me and my family drove home in my neighborhood some metallic object caught my eye and caused us to stop driving and look.

content.detailedDescription: We were boating on nolin lake and at approximately 10:20pm we saw a light in the sky to the north. it was pretty high in the sky. we were near the moutardier campground. we thought maybe it was a planet because we had already seen a planet in the sky earlier. it was a very clear sky no clouds. we were out looking for shooting stars. when we first saw it it was orangish red, then after a min or 2 it was more yellowish in color then it was gone. it did not appear to be moving to us, it stayed in the same position the whole time we saw it. maybe 3 mins total. i have never seen anything like this before
content.summary: Light object in sky orangish red then turned yellowish then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on il 83 going se near ridgland ave in a wooded area
my wife was driving i was in the passenger seat my mother was in backseat. my mother 89yoa saw a bright light in trees she told us to look at it. i observed a cone shaped white light in tress the cone then retracted into a triagle ufo i observed the light entered the ufo  then saw lighted circle in the center of the craft. revealed the outline of craft. in the dark it disapeared.
content.summary: Observed a white light in trees on right side of car.

content.summary: Ok this the really 2 events the day before this event there was a object that drop a fireball or something.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard smoking and notice the sounds of plans and helicopters and when i looked up across the lake i saw lights that were moving to where i was, with the lights from the city i could see a disc shape that was black but it had lights that went around when to me looked like windows. it came about a 100 feet from me and could of been more than 200 feet up. as this aircraft approach me i could see the plans coming after it and with the and helicopter sounds i noticed when it was close to me it didn't make any sound and it went from comming my was to a perfect left at about 30mph and at that point i went to get my camera it went behind the trees by my house and as i was trying to get a picture it made another perfect sharp left turn, it went about 200 yards and than it vanished.  the strang part was all the aircraft that night that seem to be chasing it because i am outside at night and never aircraft at all, let alone 4 or 5 that i heard and saw that night.  for whatever reason i was able to get my camera to focus to take a picture, i have one of the best cameras you can buy so i am sorry it wouldn't take a picture.
content.summary: Disk smaller than a 747 that u can see inside threw the portals.D

content.detailedDescription:
I have had atleast 4 different sightings outside my balcony in the state of arizona facing the desert. i would usually get migraines after the event, and once i lost time ( i was sitting indian style on my couch after a sighting around 10 pm and apparently passed out, only to awaken sitting upright, indian style on my couch many hours later at 4:oo am.)
once i had awoken and my hair was such a mess, full of static and just so all over the place, that it has never been before nor since that day. i would also have dreams of flying inside my apartment and outside my apartment up into the sky.
i will describe the different types of sightings below.
1. i saw red orb like objects flying high up in the sky that would hover at times and then suddenly accelerate away from each other. there were maybe two others blinking below them and they all seemed to be communicating with eachother.
2. i saw a silent, hovering rectangular type craft above me that had a series of green and red lights that beamed crisscross, and then i heard what sounded like a strong wind and just above my head coming in the opposite direction was a triangular craft that looked like dull metal, and it glided over my head and glided over the desert moving away from me for quite a while. it has 3 blinking lights.
3. my last sighting was a series of approaching star like objects that would stop in midair and illuminate more and more intensely, that it was very beautiful and i felt as though they were communicating specifically to me. there were 3 consecutive lights like this until they disappeared out of my viewing range behind my balcony.
 after the last sighting i had moved away from arizona and have since then not seen anything in the sky again. i truly miss my sightings very much and my feeling towards them is very benevolent.
i did report my sightings to the arizona republic newspaper each time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I've had at least 3 or maybe 4 sightings all in phoenix, arizona.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke. i looked off to the west at a ridge line where the sun sets. i noticed a bright light just to the left of the ridge. at first i thought it might be venus, and i was going to get my telescope. as i watched the light it was moving to the right towards the ridge. but it did not follow the same path as the other stars in the sky. i watched for about two minutes, then i decided to climb up on my porch roof to bet a better view. as i did this the light rolled behind the ridge, but i could still see the light of the object. i climbed down and looked back to the ridge i saw the light roll back over the ridge towards me. i watched for about a minute and the object shot over the ridge and out of sight. from that point i could not see the light from the craft any longer. as i watched this object i thought as it moved this is no star or planet, its not a plane or helicopter. as it was dark and about 60 degrees i heard no noise of engines or rotors.
content.summary: Saw a star like circle above a ridgeline.
